00033     ~MechanicsModel() {
00034       set<MechanicsMaterial *> UNIQUEmaterials;
00035       for (uint i = 0; i < _materials.size(); i++)
00036       UNIQUEmaterials.insert(_materials[i]);
00037     
00038       for (set<MechanicsMaterial *>::iterator it = UNIQUEmaterials.begin();
00039        it != UNIQUEmaterials.end(); it++) 
00040         delete (*it);
00041     };

00046     // From constant value
00047     void initializeField(const Real value = 1.0) {
00048       const uint numNodes = _myMesh->getNumberOfNodes();
00049       const uint dim = _myMesh->getDimension();
00050 
00051       for (uint i = 0; i < numNodes; i++) 
00052     for (uint j = 0; j < dim; j++)
00053       _field[i*dim+j] = _myMesh->getX(i,j)*value; // value = isotropic expansion/shrinking
00054     };
00055 
00057     void initializeField(const Real* value) {
00058       _field.assign(value, value+_field.size());
00059     };
00060 
00062     void linearizedUpdate(const Real* localValues, Real fact) {
00063       const int nLocalDof = (_myMesh->getNumberOfNodes())*_nodeDoF;
00064       for(uint i = 0; i < nLocalDof; i++)
00065     _field[i] += fact*localValues[i];
00066     };
00067 
00068     // One value at the time (Node ID, dof index, value)
00069     void linearizedUpdate(const int id, const int dof, const Real value) {
00070       // const uint dim = _myMesh->getDimension();
00071       // assert( id < _field.size() && dof < dim );
00072       _field[id*_nodeDoF + dof] += value;
00073     }
00074 
00075     // One value at the time (Node ID, dof index, value)
00076     void linearizedUpdate(const int dof, const Real value) {
00077       _field[dof] += value;
00078     }
00079     
00080     void setField(uint dof, Real value) {
00081       _field[dof] = value;
00082     }
00083     void setField(const Real* value) {
00084       _field.assign(value, value+_field.size());

00087     void getField(vector<double> & x) {
00088       assert(x.size() == _field.size());

00096     void printField() {
00097       int i = 0;
00098       while (i < _field.size()) {
00099     for (uint j = 0; j < _nodeDoF; j++) {
00100       cout << _field[i] << " ";
00101       i++;
00102     }
00103     cout << endl;
00104       }
00105     }
00106 
00107     void writeField(string OutputFile, int step) {
00108       // Create outputFile name
00109       stringstream FileNameStream;
00110       FileNameStream << OutputFile << step << ".dat";
00111       ofstream out;
00112       out.open( (FileNameStream.str()).c_str() );
00113   
00114       out << _field.size() << endl;
00115       for (uint i = 0; i < _field.size(); i++) {
00116     out << setprecision(15) << _field[i] << endl;
00117       }
00118       out.close();
00119     }

00121     uint getNumMat() {
00122       set<MechanicsMaterial *> UNIQUEmaterials;
00123       for (uint i = 0; i < _materials.size(); i++) 
00124     UNIQUEmaterials.insert(_materials[i]);
00125     
00126       return UNIQUEmaterials.size();
00127     }
00128 
00129     uint getTotNumMatProp() {
00130       set<MechanicsMaterial *> UNIQUEmaterials;
00131       for (uint i = 0; i < _materials.size(); i++) 
00132     UNIQUEmaterials.insert(_materials[i]);
00133       // Assume all materials are of the same type
00134     
00135       return ( UNIQUEmaterials.size() * (_materials[0]->getMaterialParameters()).size() );
00136     }
